descriptionHtml:
it is a stand-alone MOD
This mod adds a new weapon type: the Chinese Blade. Eight new Chinese Blades are added, and can be crafted without any perks. Chinese Blades use the perks of one-handed swords, but are two-handed weapons. Using them increases your one-handed skill. As they are held in two hands, they hit harder than a regular one-handed sword, dealing 1.5x the damage. With Sneak perks, they can hit for 4x the damage a one-handed sword could.
Thanks for Thomasorth\'s help.
